reviews.text: Is it worth to talk about a NA beer? I say NA, because the label says "low alcohol" but I canÂ´t find that little low amount...  in fact: clear yellow colour, gas and bubbles. Nothing else.
Probada en Beer Deluxe, Melbourne. Ale suave, con espuma media. Interesante.---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Adquirida en botella de 330 ml en Whole Foods, LES, New York. Fuerte, con sabor caramelizado y un marcado final a alcohol. Ideal para combinar con un postre a base de chocolate.---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
